info.name: Vertical MAL Favorites (Small pics)
info.description:
Make Favorites Vertical Again! Restores the favorites to as the old way they were before, as close I can get them for now, with the same vertical rows, small pics, and text style.

There is a version with big pics too and minimal versions (see link below). Some notes in the code for further changes.
info.additionalInfo:
See all Favorites themes + report issues here
https://myanimelist.net/forum/?topicid=1977172
